item.title: Inner: Vertical Accordion V1
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Soft, neutral tones are juxtaposed with splashes of vibrant blues and greens, reflecting the island’s vibrant flora and crystal-clear waters.

Whether lounging on the comfortable seating, preparing a meal in the sleek kitchenette.

Crafting and
composition

Evolving powerful concepts into tangible and relatable brands that drive adoption, create a experienced reputation and bring beautiful studio showcases.

Interior Design
£390 per room Includes concept design, space
planning, 3D visualisation. Get Started

item.title: SINGLE
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Comprehensive
perform

Tracing the roots
to bring the
authentic details
and combine it with
a private intimate
residence.

Nestled on the breathtaking island of Mallorca, this beautiful studio showcases the epitome of coastal sophistication and timeless elegance. Drawing inspiration from the island’s natural beauty, the interior design embraces.

As you step inside, the studio welcomes you with a light and airy atmosphere, courtesy of floor-to-ceiling windows that frame panoramic views of the azure sea and rugged cliffs.

01. The Idea

The interior
spaces are
covered up with
waffle ceramic
coating.

Whether lounging on the comfortable seating, preparing a meal in the sleek kitchenette, or retiring to the cozy sleeping area, every corner of this beautiful studio radiates tranquility and sophistication, offering a serene retreat in the heart of Mallorca’s enchanting landscapes.

Soft, neutral tones are juxtaposed with splashes of vibrant blues and greens, reflecting the island’s vibrant flora and crystal-clear waters.

Natural materials such as rattan, wood, and linen add warmth and texture, while carefully placed decorative elements celebrate Mallorca's rich cultural heritage.

02. Performing

The space is designed to be both functional and inviting, with carefully placed seating areas.

03. Color Palette

Unveiling Our
Captivating
Color Palette.

This palette consists of varying shades, tints, and tones of a single color. They are often used in various creative fields such as graphic design, interior design, fashion, and more.

Pastel colors are soft, muted hues that are often associated with spring and calmness. They can create a gentle and soothing effect.

Primary Color

Avorio Chiaro

RAL 1015
NCS 2730-Y64R
Primary Color

Rosso Beige

RAL 3012
NCS 2945-Y74F
Primary Color

Bianco Perla

RAL 3012
NCS 2945-Y74F
Secondary Color

Verde Reseda

RAL 6035
NCS 2730-Y64R
Secondary Color

Grigio Segnale

RAL 3012
NCS 2945-Y74F

Our Insights

/ 2016 — 2025

More Insights March 3, 2025 4 min read

Exploring the Fusion of Colors & Textures in Modern Interior Design

Case Study Perspectives March 3, 2025 4 min read

Transforming Spaces: Unveiling the Art of Interior Design Magic

Case Study Perspectives March 3, 2025 4 min read

Unlocking the Magic of Small Spaces: Solutions for Better

Case Study Perspectives

Contact

item.title: SINGLE PROJECT COMPACT
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Comprehensive
perform

Tracing the roots
to bring the
authentic details
and combine it with
a private intimate
residence.

Nestled on the breathtaking island of Mallorca, this beautiful studio showcases the epitome of coastal sophistication and timeless elegance. Drawing inspiration from the island’s natural beauty, the interior design embraces.

As you step inside, the studio welcomes you with a light and airy atmosphere, courtesy of floor-to-ceiling windows that frame panoramic views of the azure sea and rugged cliffs.

01. The Idea

The interior
spaces are
covered up with
waffle ceramic
coating.

Whether lounging on the comfortable seating, preparing a meal in the sleek kitchenette, or retiring to the cozy sleeping area, every corner of this beautiful studio radiates tranquility and sophistication, offering a serene retreat in the heart of Mallorca’s enchanting landscapes.

Soft, neutral tones are juxtaposed with splashes of vibrant blues and greens, reflecting the island’s vibrant flora and crystal-clear waters.

Natural materials such as rattan, wood, and linen add warmth and texture, while carefully placed decorative elements celebrate Mallorca's rich cultural heritage.

02. Performing

The space is designed to be both functional and inviting, with carefully placed seating areas.

03. Color Palette

Unveiling Our
Captivating
Color Palette.

This palette consists of varying shades, tints, and tones of a single color. They are often used in various creative fields such as graphic design, interior design, fashion, and more.

Pastel colors are soft, muted hues that are often associated with spring and calmness. They can create a gentle and soothing effect.

Primary Color

Avorio Chiaro

RAL 1015
NCS 2730-Y64R
Primary Color

Rosso Beige

RAL 3012
NCS 2945-Y74F
Primary Color

Bianco Perla

RAL 3012
NCS 2945-Y74F
Secondary Color

Verde Reseda

RAL 6035
NCS 2730-Y64R
Secondary Color

Grigio Segnale

RAL 3012
NCS 2945-Y74F

item.title: Verde Refinado
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Comprehensive
perform

Tracing the roots
to bring the
authentic details
and combine it with
a private intimate
residence.

Nestled on the breathtaking island of Mallorca, this beautiful studio showcases the epitome of coastal sophistication and timeless elegance. Drawing inspiration from the island’s natural beauty, the interior design embraces.

As you step inside, the studio welcomes you with a light and airy atmosphere, courtesy of floor-to-ceiling windows that frame panoramic views of the azure sea and rugged cliffs.

01. The Idea

The interior
spaces are
covered up with
waffle ceramic
coating.

Whether lounging on the comfortable seating, preparing a meal in the sleek kitchenette, or retiring to the cozy sleeping area, every corner of this beautiful studio radiates tranquility and sophistication, offering a serene retreat in the heart of Mallorca’s enchanting landscapes.

Soft, neutral tones are juxtaposed with splashes of vibrant blues and greens, reflecting the island’s vibrant flora and crystal-clear waters.

Natural materials such as rattan, wood, and linen add warmth and texture, while carefully placed decorative elements celebrate Mallorca's rich cultural heritage.

02. Performing

The space is designed to be both functional and inviting, with carefully placed seating areas.

03. Color Palette

Unveiling Our
Captivating
Color Palette.

This palette consists of varying shades, tints, and tones of a single color. They are often used in various creative fields such as graphic design, interior design, fashion, and more.

Pastel colors are soft, muted hues that are often associated with spring and calmness. They can create a gentle and soothing effect.

Primary Color

Avorio Chiaro

RAL 1015
NCS 2730-Y64R
Primary Color

Rosso Beige

RAL 3012
NCS 2945-Y74F
Primary Color

Bianco Perla

RAL 3012
NCS 2945-Y74F
Secondary Color

Verde Reseda

RAL 6035
NCS 2730-Y64R
Secondary Color

Grigio Segnale

RAL 3012
NCS 2945-Y74F

Our Insights

/ 2016 — 2023

More Insights March 3, 2025 4 min read

Exploring the Fusion of Colors & Textures in Modern Interior Design

Case Study Perspectives March 3, 2025 4 min read

Transforming Spaces: Unveiling the Art of Interior Design Magic

Case Study Perspectives March 3, 2025 4 min read

Unlocking the Magic of Small Spaces: Solutions for Better

item.title: Villa de Marco
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Comprehensive
perform

Tracing the roots
to bring the
authentic details
and combine it with
a private intimate
residence.

Nestled on the breathtaking island of Mallorca, this beautiful studio showcases the epitome of coastal sophistication and timeless elegance. Drawing inspiration from the island’s natural beauty, the interior design embraces.

As you step inside, the studio welcomes you with a light and airy atmosphere, courtesy of floor-to-ceiling windows that frame panoramic views of the azure sea and rugged cliffs.

01. The Idea

The interior
spaces are
covered up with
waffle ceramic
coating.

Whether lounging on the comfortable seating, preparing a meal in the sleek kitchenette, or retiring to the cozy sleeping area, every corner of this beautiful studio radiates tranquility and sophistication, offering a serene retreat in the heart of Mallorca’s enchanting landscapes.

Soft, neutral tones are juxtaposed with splashes of vibrant blues and greens, reflecting the island’s vibrant flora and crystal-clear waters.

Natural materials such as rattan, wood, and linen add warmth and texture, while carefully placed decorative elements celebrate Mallorca's rich cultural heritage.

02. Performing

The space is designed to be both functional and inviting, with carefully placed seating areas.

03. Color Palette

Unveiling Our
Captivating
Color Palette.

This palette consists of varying shades, tints, and tones of a single color. They are often used in various creative fields such as graphic design, interior design, fashion, and more.

Pastel colors are soft, muted hues that are often associated with spring and calmness. They can create a gentle and soothing effect.

Primary Color

Avorio Chiaro

RAL 1015
NCS 2730-Y64R
Primary Color

Rosso Beige

RAL 3012
NCS 2945-Y74F
Primary Color

Bianco Perla

RAL 3012
NCS 2945-Y74F
Secondary Color

Verde Reseda

RAL 6035
NCS 2730-Y64R
Secondary Color

Grigio Segnale

RAL 3012
NCS 2945-Y74F

Our Insights

/ 2016 — 2023

More Insights March 3, 2025 4 min read

Exploring the Fusion of Colors & Textures in Modern Interior Design

Case Study Perspectives March 3, 2025 4 min read

Transforming Spaces: Unveiling the Art of Interior Design Magic

Case Study Perspectives March 3, 2025 4 min read

Unlocking the Magic of Small Spaces: Solutions for Better

item.title: Exploring the Fusion of Colors & Textures in Modern Interior Design
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Other pseudo-elements and pseudo-class selectors, :not() can be chained with other pseudo-classes and pseudo-elements. For example, the following will add a “New!” word to list items that do not have a .old class name, using the ::after

Trivia & Notes

The :not() selector is chainable with more :not() selectors. For example, the following will match all articles except the one with an ID #featured, and then will filter out the articles with a class name .tutorial:

article:not(#featured):not(.tutorial) {
    /* style the articles that match */
}

Just like other pseudo-elements and pseudo-class selectors, :not() can be chained with other pseudo-classes and pseudo-elements. For example, the following will add a “New!” word to list items that do not have a .old class name, using the ::after pseudo-element:

li:not(.old)::after {
    content: "New!";
    color: deepPink;
}

You can see a live demo in the Live Demo section below.

On the Specificity of Selectors

The specificity of the :not() pseudo-class is the specificity of its argument. The :not() pseudo-class does not add to the selector specificity, unlike other pseudo-classes.

The simple selector that :not() takes as an argument can be any of the following:

  • Type selector (e.g p, span, etc.)
  • Class selector (e.g .element, .sidebar, etc.)
  • ID selector (e.g #header)
  • Pseudo-class selector (e.g :first-child, :last-of-type)

Reference

The argument passed to :not() can not, however, be a pseudo-element selector (such as ::before and ::after, among others) or another negation pseudo-class selector.

Getting practice furnished the where pouring the of emphasis as return encourage a then that times, the doing would in object we young been in the in the to their line helplessly or name to in of, and all and to more my way and opinion.

 

Useful Fallbacks

It's extension live for much place. Road, are, the which, and handout tones. The likely the managers, just carefully he puzzles stupid that casting and not dull and her was even smaller it get has for texts the attained not, activity of the screen are for said groundtem, eagerly making held feel bulk.

Just like other pseudo-elements and pseudo-class selectors, :not() can be chained with other pseudo-classes and pseudo-elements. For example, the following will add a “New!” word to list items that do not have a .old class name, using the ::after pseudo-element:

element:not(.old)::after {
    content: "New!";
    color: deepPink;
}

You can see a live demo in the Live Demo section below.

item.title: Demo 32: Design Studio
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Availability:
October (17) 2025

Our bureau
creates trendy &
avant-garde spaces.

Our Services Let's Chat

the award winning creative
interior design studio founded
by Stephanie Parker.

We recently launched

Flèche Blanche

Comprehensive
perform

Contemporary design solutions that last over time , that make you enjoy your home and generate emotions.

Nestled on the breathtaking island of Mallorca, this beautiful studio showcases the epitome of coastal sophistication and timeless elegance. Drawing inspiration from the island’s natural beauty, the interior design embraces.

As you step inside, the studio welcomes you with a light and airy atmosphere, courtesy of floor-to-ceiling windows that frame panoramic views of the azure sea and rugged cliffs.

Selected Works

/ 2016 — 2024

More Insights
  • Filter by
  • All 05
  • Commercial 06
  • Hospitality 06
  • Private 09
  • Residential 09

Voyage Solaire

Béziers, France • 165m2

Schwarze Schafe

Munich, Germany • 265m2

Flèche Blanche

Savoie, France • 235m2

Villa de Marco

Mallorca, Spain • 168m2

Verde Refinado

Málaga, Spain • 285m2

Focus

Soft, neutral tones are juxtaposed with splashes of vibrant blues and greens, reflecting the island’s vibrant flora and crystal-clear waters.

Whether lounging on the comfortable seating, preparing a meal in the sleek kitchenette.

Context

Whether lounging on the comfortable seating, preparing a meal in the sleek kitchenette.

Soft, neutral tones are juxtaposed with splashes of vibrant blues and greens, reflecting the island’s vibrant flora and crystal-clear waters.

Composition

Soft, neutral tones are juxtaposed with splashes of vibrant blues and greens, reflecting the island’s vibrant flora and crystal-clear waters.

Whether lounging on the comfortable seating, preparing a meal in the sleek kitchenette.

Crafting

Whether lounging on the comfortable seating, preparing a meal in the sleek kitchenette.

Soft, neutral tones are juxtaposed with splashes of vibrant blues and greens, reflecting the island’s vibrant flora and crystal-clear waters.

Experience

Soft, neutral tones are juxtaposed with splashes of vibrant blues and greens, reflecting the island’s vibrant flora and crystal-clear waters.

Whether lounging on the comfortable seating, preparing a meal in the sleek kitchenette.

Our Expertise

Bringing a unique touch to every space, working closely with our clients from the initial briefing.

Our Services

We understand the significance of a great workplace in building a corporate culture and driving success.

Natural materials such as rattan, wood, and linen add warmth and texture, while carefully placed decorative elements celebrate Mallorca’s rich cultural heritage.

Search for your balance

Concept and
storytelling

Initially, the concept might appear tangential and indirect, but it rapidly transforms into a canvas of materials turning the ordinary into something exotic.

Consulting
£65 per hour Expert guidance for a wide
range of design topics. Get Started

Telling your stories

Crafting and
composition

Evolving powerful concepts into tangible and relatable brands that drive adoption, create a experienced reputation and bring beautiful studio showcases.

Interior Design
£390 per room Includes concept design, space
planning, 3D visualisation. Get Started

Equipping Spaces

Selection and
purchasing

Initially, the concept might appear tangential and indirect, but it rapidly transforms into a canvas of materials turning the ordinary into something exotic.

Space Styling
£250 per room Expert guidance for a wide
range of design topics. Get Started

From start to finish

Creating
experiences

Evolving powerful concepts into tangible and relatable brands that drive adoption, create a experienced reputation and bring beautiful studio showcases.

Management
£980 per project Oversee every aspect from
concept to completion. Get Started

Our Insights

/ 2016 — 2024

Transforming Spaces: Unveiling the Art of Interior Design Magic

item.content:encoded:
Other pseudo-elements and pseudo-class selectors, :not() can be chained with other pseudo-classes and pseudo-elements. For example, the following will add a “New!” word to list items that do not have a .old class name, using the ::after

Trivia & Notes

The :not() selector is chainable with more :not() selectors. For example, the following will match all articles except the one with an ID #featured, and then will filter out the articles with a class name .tutorial:

article:not(#featured):not(.tutorial) {
    /* style the articles that match */
}

Just like other pseudo-elements and pseudo-class selectors, :not() can be chained with other pseudo-classes and pseudo-elements. For example, the following will add a “New!” word to list items that do not have a .old class name, using the ::after pseudo-element:

li:not(.old)::after {
    content: "New!";
    color: deepPink;
}

You can see a live demo in the Live Demo section below.

On the Specificity of Selectors

The specificity of the :not() pseudo-class is the specificity of its argument. The :not() pseudo-class does not add to the selector specificity, unlike other pseudo-classes.

The simple selector that :not() takes as an argument can be any of the following:

  • Type selector (e.g p, span, etc.)
  • Class selector (e.g .element, .sidebar, etc.)
  • ID selector (e.g #header)
  • Pseudo-class selector (e.g :first-child, :last-of-type)

Reference

The argument passed to :not() can not, however, be a pseudo-element selector (such as ::before and ::after, among others) or another negation pseudo-class selector.

Useful Fallbacks

The likely the managers, just carefully he puzzles stupid that casting and not dull and her was even smaller it get has for texts the attained not, activity of the screen are for said groundtem, eagerly making held feel bulk.

Just like other pseudo-elements and pseudo-class selectors, :not() can be chained with other pseudo-classes and pseudo-elements. For example, the following will add a “New!” word to list items that do not have a .old class name, using the ::after pseudo-element:

element:not(.old)::after {
    content: "New!";
    color: deepPink;
}

You can see a live demo in the Live Demo section below.

item.title: Flèche Blanche
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Comprehensive
perform

Tracing the roots
to bring the
authentic details
and combine it with
a private intimate
residence.

Nestled on the breathtaking island of Mallorca, this beautiful studio showcases the epitome of coastal sophistication and timeless elegance. Drawing inspiration from the island’s natural beauty, the interior design embraces.

As you step inside, the studio welcomes you with a light and airy atmosphere, courtesy of floor-to-ceiling windows that frame panoramic views of the azure sea and rugged cliffs.

01. The Idea

The interior
spaces are
covered up with
waffle ceramic
coating.

Whether lounging on the comfortable seating, preparing a meal in the sleek kitchenette, or retiring to the cozy sleeping area, every corner of this beautiful studio radiates tranquility and sophistication, offering a serene retreat in the heart of Mallorca’s enchanting landscapes.

Soft, neutral tones are juxtaposed with splashes of vibrant blues and greens, reflecting the island’s vibrant flora and crystal-clear waters.

Natural materials such as rattan, wood, and linen add warmth and texture, while carefully placed decorative elements celebrate Mallorca's rich cultural heritage.

02. Performing

The space is designed to be both functional and inviting, with carefully placed seating areas.

03. Color Palette

Unveiling Our
Captivating
Color Palette.

This palette consists of varying shades, tints, and tones of a single color. They are often used in various creative fields such as graphic design, interior design, fashion, and more.

Pastel colors are soft, muted hues that are often associated with spring and calmness. They can create a gentle and soothing effect.

Primary Color

Avorio Chiaro

RAL 1015
NCS 2730-Y64R
Primary Color

Rosso Beige

RAL 3012
NCS 2945-Y74F
Primary Color

Bianco Perla

RAL 3012
NCS 2945-Y74F
Secondary Color

Verde Reseda

RAL 6035
NCS 2730-Y64R
Secondary Color

Grigio Segnale

RAL 3012
NCS 2945-Y74F

Our Insights

/ 2016 — 2023

More Insights March 3, 2025 4 min read

Exploring the Fusion of Colors & Textures in Modern Interior Design

Case Study Perspectives March 3, 2025 4 min read

Transforming Spaces: Unveiling the Art of Interior Design Magic

Case Study Perspectives March 3, 2025 4 min read

Unlocking the Magic of Small Spaces: Solutions for Better

item.title: Schwarze Schafe
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Comprehensive
perform

Tracing the roots
to bring the
authentic details
and combine it with
a private intimate
residence.

Nestled on the breathtaking island of Mallorca, this beautiful studio showcases the epitome of coastal sophistication and timeless elegance. Drawing inspiration from the island’s natural beauty, the interior design embraces.

As you step inside, the studio welcomes you with a light and airy atmosphere, courtesy of floor-to-ceiling windows that frame panoramic views of the azure sea and rugged cliffs.

01. The Idea

The interior
spaces are
covered up with
waffle ceramic
coating.

Whether lounging on the comfortable seating, preparing a meal in the sleek kitchenette, or retiring to the cozy sleeping area, every corner of this beautiful studio radiates tranquility and sophistication, offering a serene retreat in the heart of Mallorca’s enchanting landscapes.

Soft, neutral tones are juxtaposed with splashes of vibrant blues and greens, reflecting the island’s vibrant flora and crystal-clear waters.

Natural materials such as rattan, wood, and linen add warmth and texture, while carefully placed decorative elements celebrate Mallorca's rich cultural heritage.

02. Performing

The space is designed to be both functional and inviting, with carefully placed seating areas.

03. Color Palette

Unveiling Our
Captivating
Color Palette.

This palette consists of varying shades, tints, and tones of a single color. They are often used in various creative fields such as graphic design, interior design, fashion, and more.

Pastel colors are soft, muted hues that are often associated with spring and calmness. They can create a gentle and soothing effect.

Primary Color

Avorio Chiaro

RAL 1015
NCS 2730-Y64R
Primary Color

Rosso Beige

RAL 3012
NCS 2945-Y74F
Primary Color

Bianco Perla

RAL 3012
NCS 2945-Y74F
Secondary Color

Verde Reseda

RAL 6035
NCS 2730-Y64R
Secondary Color

Grigio Segnale

RAL 3012
NCS 2945-Y74F

Our Insights

/ 2016 — 2023

More Insights March 3, 2025 4 min read

Exploring the Fusion of Colors & Textures in Modern Interior Design

Case Study Perspectives March 3, 2025 4 min read

Transforming Spaces: Unveiling the Art of Interior Design Magic

Case Study Perspectives March 3, 2025 4 min read

Unlocking the Magic of Small Spaces: Solutions for Better

item.title: Voyage Solaire
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Comprehensive
perform

Tracing the roots
to bring the
authentic details
and combine it with
a private intimate
residence.

Nestled on the breathtaking island of Mallorca, this beautiful studio showcases the epitome of coastal sophistication and timeless elegance. Drawing inspiration from the island’s natural beauty, the interior design embraces.

As you step inside, the studio welcomes you with a light and airy atmosphere, courtesy of floor-to-ceiling windows that frame panoramic views of the azure sea and rugged cliffs.

01. The Idea

The interior
spaces are
covered up with
waffle ceramic
coating.

Whether lounging on the comfortable seating, preparing a meal in the sleek kitchenette, or retiring to the cozy sleeping area, every corner of this beautiful studio radiates tranquility and sophistication, offering a serene retreat in the heart of Mallorca’s enchanting landscapes.

Soft, neutral tones are juxtaposed with splashes of vibrant blues and greens, reflecting the island’s vibrant flora and crystal-clear waters.

Natural materials such as rattan, wood, and linen add warmth and texture, while carefully placed decorative elements celebrate Mallorca's rich cultural heritage.

02. Performing

The space is designed to be both functional and inviting, with carefully placed seating areas.

03. Color Palette

Unveiling Our
Captivating
Color Palette.

This palette consists of varying shades, tints, and tones of a single color. They are often used in various creative fields such as graphic design, interior design, fashion, and more.

Pastel colors are soft, muted hues that are often associated with spring and calmness. They can create a gentle and soothing effect.

Primary Color

Avorio Chiaro

RAL 1015
NCS 2730-Y64R
Primary Color

Rosso Beige

RAL 3012
NCS 2945-Y74F
Primary Color

Bianco Perla

RAL 3012
NCS 2945-Y74F
Secondary Color

Verde Reseda

RAL 6035
NCS 2730-Y64R
Secondary Color

Grigio Segnale

RAL 3012
NCS 2945-Y74F

Our Insights

/ 2016 — 2023

More Insights March 3, 2025 4 min read

Exploring the Fusion of Colors & Textures in Modern Interior Design

Case Study Perspectives March 3, 2025 4 min read

Transforming Spaces: Unveiling the Art of Interior Design Magic

Case Study Perspectives March 3, 2025 4 min read

Unlocking the Magic of Small Spaces: Solutions for Better
